text: My favourite cycling rest spots. Now you can use the eastern route from Pasir Ris to East Coast. Basically, just follow the river flow or big drainage.

The Pasir Ris Park PCN is really a great gift to the neighbourhood. It connects the various corners of the park into this interwoven web of tracks that can lead you from point to point. The greatest consolation of them all are how the trees are planted. It provides some much needed shades as well as giving the park an identity that differentiates from other parks.
Great sunset views by the rocks. Light presence of people. It does get dark quickly. Easily accessible to Down town east

Went there for the first time... Took a day off and started from Pasir Ris MRT and went all the way to Punggol and Coney Island... Didn't expected to be mesmerized by the surroundings and felt like Kampong days of old.
